main event: Four witnesses observed a rectangular shaped object moving slowly across the sky at an altitude of approximately 1500 feet in Grand Portage, Minnesota.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10-15 seconds before disappearing from view., The witnesses noted the object appeared to be approximately 5 feet long and 1.5 feet wide., The sighting occurred on a clear night with no visible clouds., The sightings included a stationary orange-red glow observed for 15 minutes at a higher altitude., No sound was associated with either object reported.
sighted object: rectangular shaped object and an orange-red glow in the sky
witness description: witnesses included a driver and others nearby observing the sky
